description: VoIPstudio is a complete business phone system and scalable call center

actions.name: makeACallToLead
actions.description: Make a leadcall from user to e164 number

actions.name: makeACall
actions.description: Make a call to a number in e164 format

actions.name: makeAWebcall
actions.description: Make a webcall from e164 number to other e164 number or extension

triggers.name: callConnected
triggers.description: Triggered when a call is connected

triggers.name: callEnded
triggers.description: Triggered when a call ends or is terminated

triggers.name: callTracking
triggers.description: Triggers when call associated with Call Tracking campaign visits is finished.

triggers.name: dtmfReceived
triggers.description: Triggered when a DTMF (Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency) tone is received during a call

triggers.name: missedCall
triggers.description: Triggered when an incoming call is not answered (missed call)

triggers.name: newCallRecording
triggers.description: Triggers when a new call recording is ready for a completed call.

triggers.name: smsReceived
triggers.description: Triggers when an SMS message is received in VoipStudio.
